properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 9:48AM EST until February 14 at 10:45AM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers ...

French Broad River Near Newport TN affecting Cocke and Jefferson
Counties

The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The French Broad River Near Newport TN.
* From this evening until Friday morning.
* At 08:45 AM Thursday the stage was 6.8 feet and rising.
* Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tonight and continue to rise
to near 10.5 feet after midnight. The river will fall below
flood stage during Friday morning.
* At 10.0 feet...Agricultural land near the gage on Highway 321 is
flooded.
properties.instruction:
Most deaths in floods occur in automobiles. If you come to a closed
or flooded road, Turn Around! Don't Drown! For more details, stay
tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or commercial television or radio
stations that carry weather information.
